```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


crash
```{r}
crash_df = read_csv("./data/Motor_Vehicle_Collisions_-_Crashes_20251102.csv", na = c("NA",".","")) |>
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  
  # Keep Manhattan records
  filter(borough == "MANHATTAN") |>
  
  # Separate the crash_date column (creates character columns)
  separate(
    crash_date,
    into = c("month", "day", "year"),
    sep = "/"
  ) |>
  
  # filter for the specified range (2016-2025)
  mutate(year = as.numeric(year)) |>
  filter(year %in% 2021:2025) |>
  
  relocate(year, month, day, crash_time, collision_id)

write_csv(crash_df, "./data/crashes_20251102_filtered.csv")
```
